info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:39AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with Heavy Rain... Thunderstorms with heavy rain and gusty winds will continue to move eastward across the area over the next couple of hours. Gusts over 30 mph are possible. Heavy rainfall of 1 to 2 inches per hour is possible. This may lead to ponding of water on roads and in low lying or poorly drained areas, and produce rises on area creeks and streams. Localized flash flooding is possible, and a Flash Flood Watch remains in effect until Noon. Also accompanying the storms will be frequent lightning. Motorists should be prepared for reduced visibilities and ponding water on roadways for the morning commute.
